If you're looking for another classic adventure film with a similar tone and sense of excitement, I would recommend "Raiders of the Lost Ark." It's an action-packed tale of archaeological discovery and global intrigue, starring Harrison Ford in his iconic role as Indiana Jones.

Alternatively, if you're open to something a bit more recent, "The Mummy" (1999) is another adventure movie with a similar mix of action, suspense, and pulse-pounding excitement. It stars Brendan Fraser in the lead role and features a thrilling tale of ancient curses and hidden treasures.
